text: 23.34: Sng 22.18; Ais 53.12; Mt 5.44; FG 3.17; 7.60Mbe Zisas ndim khanarareŋ ga ntorgim, ana khanarareŋ vun kav khaŋ Fhe Bakɨme nzuai, “O, Fhe, ndu kheiŋ mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi, ndu nta vhɨzgip nta ndɨkndɨgɨ thari. Mbe kha mbui bigeŋ, mbe ne kaŋgi fhuvara.” Mbe Zisas ndim, khanarareŋ ga ntorgap, mba ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi, mbe Zisas shagi ndir zav, nta nzuav satu suri.
